name: Sticky Notes Auto Layout Components / Post-its
description:
Introduction:

This file contains auto-layout sticky note components (fixed & dynamic) which you can customize in any way you want.


What will you find in the file:

  • Infinite-height sticky note component.
  • Fixed-height sticky note component.
  • Colors, fonts & drop shadow are saved as styles within the file.


How To Use This File:

Make an instance from the intended component.

Write your note.

To create your custom size & style sticky notes take a look at the documentation in the component page.


Note: each sticky note component has a hidden footer, you can reveal the footer from the layer panel.
